items.name: Frog Ring
items.description:
Give all ten to Jenny and
see what happens!

items.name: Wastepaper
items.description:
Jenny used it to doodle...
Dad used it as a handkerchief!

items.name: Spoon
items.description:
Chibi-Robo can use this as a
shovel.

items.name: Mug
items.description:
Chibi-Robo can wear this like
a suit of armor.

items.name: Drake Redcrest Suit
items.description:
Lets you transform into
Drake Redcrest!

items.name: Frog Suit
items.description: Lets you transform into a frog!

items.name: Pajamas
items.description:
Pose in these to end your day
or night.

items.name: Super Chibi-Robo Suit
items.description: The most wanted suit of all!

items.name: Trauma Suit
items.description:
Lets you transform into an
injured...robot? Ouch!

items.name: Ghost Suit
items.description:
Lets you transform into a ghost!
Whooooooo!

items.name: Treasure Map B
items.description:
"To find this treasure, you will
need many keys."

items.name: Treasure Map C
items.description:
"Fly from the Great Tree's branch
and dig at the hollow point."

items.name: Popper Trash
items.description:
Clean up after yourself!
Celebrations ain't free!

items.name: Empty Bottle
items.description:
Don't cut yourself while
throwing it away!

items.name: Broken Bottle
items.description:
Don't cut yourself while
throwing it away!

items.name: Broken Bottle
items.description:
Don't cut yourself while
throwing it away!

items.name: Charge Chip
items.description:
Enables the Chibi-Blaster to fire
a charged shot.

items.name: Range Chip
items.description:
Enables the Chibi-Blaster to fire
long-distance shots.

items.name: Toy Receipt
items.description: A receipt that Dad had hidden.

items.name: Squirter
items.description: Used to suck up and spray liquids.

items.name: Mom's Letter
items.description:
Mmm... This letter contains some
bad news...

items.name: Alien Ear Chip
items.description:
"Now friend can understand our
alien tongue."

items.name: Timer 5
items.description:
Five minutes for half a day.
The initial time setting.

items.name: Dinah Teeth
items.description:
"My teef! My beautiful teef!
I can't bite without 'em!"

items.name: Timer 10
items.description:
Ten minutes for half a day.
For a leisurely pace.

items.name: Timer 15
items.description:
Fifteen minutes for half a day.
For a truly leisurely pace.

items.name: Pink Flower Seed
items.description:
A pink flower will grow from
this seed.

items.name: Blue Flower Seed
items.description:
A blue flower will grow from
this seed.

items.name: White Flower Seed
items.description:
A white flower will grow from
this seed.

items.name: Snorkle & Goggles
items.description: Needed to move around in water.

items.name: Love Letter
items.description:
Hopefully it gets delivered soon.
True love cannot wait.

items.name: Bandage
items.description:
Used to mend injuries or horrify
bystanders.

items.name: Space Scrambler
items.description:
A remote-control space fighter.
Perhaps YOU can use it someday.

items.name: Free Rangers Photo
items.description: A group photo of the soldiers.

items.name: Circuit Schematic
items.description:
Electronic plans for increasing
the Chibi-Blaster's strength.

items.name: The Scurvy Splinter
items.description:
Yar! Avast, mateys! Time to
hunt for treasure!

items.name: Outdated Scarf
items.description:
A scarf worn by Mom when
she was young.

items.name: Hot Rod
items.description:
A popular car among racers.
Perhaps YOU will race one day.

items.name: Dad's Wedding Ring
items.description:
The number "200667" is engraved
on the inside.

items.name: Passed-out Frog
items.description:
It looks like he's only passed out...
Whew!

items.name: Chibi-Blaster
items.description: Allows you to fire sonic blasts.

items.name: Chibi-Radar
items.description:
Lets you see things that are
hidden from normal view.

items.name: Super Eggplant
items.description: A vegetable with lots of nutrition.

items.name: Legendary Flower Seed
items.description:
It takes ten years for this flower
to grow!

items.name: Nectar Flower Seed
items.description:
A cute nectar flower will grow
from this seed.

items.name: Freaky Phil
items.description:
Funky Phil's child. Not like
the other children...

letickers.name: Living Room Ladder
letickers.description:
A ladder that reaches high places.
Placed near the Chibi-Robo House.

letickers.name: Kitchen Ladder
letickers.description:
A ladder that reaches high places.
Placed near the sink.

letickers.name: Foyer Ladder
letickers.description:
A ladder that reaches high places.
Placed near the stairs.

letickers.name: Foyer Warp
letickers.description:
Warps you from place to place.
Placed on both ends of the stairs.

letickers.name: Living Room Bridge
letickers.description:
A bridge that stretches far.
Placed on top of the bookcase.

letickers.name: Kitchen Bridge
letickers.description:
A bridge that stretches far.
Placed near the planter.

letickers.name: Bedroom Bridge
letickers.description:
A bridge that stretches far.
Placed on the ceiling beam.

letickers.name: Basement Warp
letickers.description:
Warps you from place to place.
Placed on both ends of the stairs.
